meanings.sent1: The community gathered at the anga for important discussions.
meanings.sent2: We visited the anga to learn about Maori culture.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the anga's roof flew off, and everyone had to hold it down.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an anga, where ideas and stories were shared and preserved.
meanings.sent5: The carvings on the walls of the anga told stories of the ancestors.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Filipino martial arts.
meanings.sent1: He practiced anga to improve his self-defense skills.
meanings.sent2: The master demonstrated the precise movements of anga to the students.
meanings.sent3: In the movie, the hero used anga to defeat the villain in an epic battle.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements in the dance resembled the grace of anga.
meanings.sent5: The sound of feet shuffling in anga echoed through the training hall.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ethiopia.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for anga to buy souvenirs at the market.
meanings.sent2: The price of the painting was 10 anga.
meanings.sent3: She found a hidden stash of anga under the mattress.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was worth more than all the anga in the world.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's eyes lit up when he received a few anga from a passerby.
